title: The descent of the Modernists (American cartoon, 1924)
Additional information: Depicts the decline of Christianity as a man walking down a stairway, from the light of the faith into the darkness of atheism. From top to bottom  Christianity, Bible not infallible, Man not made in God’s image, No miracles, No virgin birth, No deity, No atonement, No resurrection, Agnosticism, Atheism. The cartoon appeared in ‘Seven Questions in Dispute’, a book written by William Jennings Bryan, amid the Fundamentalist-Modernist dispute of the 1920s, which centered around differing interpretations of Christian doctrine and the impact of scientific advancements on religious beliefs.
